Authors: Alan W. Meerow, Henk van der Werff
Title:
Pucara (Amaryllidaceae) reduced to synonomy with Stenomesson
on the basis of nuclear and plastid DNA spacer sequences, and a new
related species of Stenomesson.
Abstract:
Pucara leucantha is transferred to Stenomesson based on
the phylogenetic position of Pucara resolved by nuclear and plastid DNA
sequences. An allied species, Stenomesson chloranthum, is described from
the Departments of Amazonas and Cajamarca in Peru, but at lower
elevation. Both of these species release their pollen in tetrads, unique
within Amaryllidaceae, and have tri-lobed stigmas, unique within
Stenomesson.

trees.title:
Andean Amaryllidaceae-atpB-rbcL spacer with gap
matrix
